title: Ne me quitte pas (2013)
overview: The film tells the story of two friends who want to disappear from life. While their country Belgium is falling apart, two lost souls cling to each other.
storyline: Ne Me Quitte Pas is a tragicomic ode to failure. Set in the Belgian countryside, Bob (Flemish) and Marcel (Walloon) share their solitude, sense of humor and craving for alcohol. It is a story about mortality in a place where time seems to stand still.
